<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Extend Elixir](/Feats.aspx?ID=5791) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemist" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=812" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 67 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

Integrating your own personal energy into the elixirs you create causes them to affect you for longer. When you consume one of your alchemical items that has the [elixir](/Traits.aspx?ID=589) and [infused](/Traits.aspx?ID=797) traits and a duration of 1 minute or longer, that elixir's duration is doubled. If you created the item with [Quick Alchemy](/Actions.aspx?ID=2801), this can't cause it to exceed the 10-minute duration limit.

<title level="2">Extend Elixir leads to...</title>
[Eternal Elixir](/Feats.aspx?ID=5797), [Persistent Mutagen](/Feats.aspx?ID=5799)
name: Extend Elixir
